### Biography

I am a Government and Politics Ph.D. student at the University of Maryland. I study American Politics, my research interests are American behavior, race and ethnic politics, political psychology and political media. I earned my B.A. in Political Science at Washington State University in 2022, double majored in Political Science and Philosophy.
